name: PC Building Simulator
description: Build and grow your very own computer repair enterprise as you learn to diagnose, fix and build PCs. With real-world licensed components and comprehensive hardware and software simulation, you can plan and bring your ultimate PC to life.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or higher Processor: Intel Core i5-2500K or AMD Athlon X4 740 (or equivalent) Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 660 (2048 MB) or Radeon R9 285 (2048 MB) - Integrated GPUs may work but are not supported. DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 7 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX compatible
